name: Flask-Dance with BitBucket
description: Testing Flask-Dance's OAuth integration with BitBucket

FLASK_SECRET_KEY.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of signed cookies.

BITBUCKET_OAUTH_CLIENT_ID.description: The OAuth client ID for your application, assigned by BitBucket

BITBUCKET_OAUTH_CLIENT_SECRET.description: The OAuth client secret for your application, assigned by BitBucket
